## Q1

Read [Chapter 7](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/exploratory-data-analysis.html) (Exploratory Data Analysis) of _R for Data Science_ and do exercises 7.3.4, 7.4.1, 7.5.1.1, 7.5.2.1, and 7.5.3.1.

# Exercise 7.3.4
## Number 1

    ```{R}
    library(tidyverse)
    
    ggplot(data = diamonds) +
      geom_freqpoly(binwidth = 0.1, color = "blue", 
                    aes(x = diamonds$x, y = ..count..), show.legend = TRUE) +
      geom_freqpoly(binwidth = 0.1, color = "red", 
                    aes(x = diamonds$y, y = ..count..), show.legend = TRUE) +
      geom_freqpoly(binwidth = 0.1, color = "green", 
                    aes(x = diamonds$z, y = ..count..), show.legend = TRUE) +
      xlim(0, 10)
    ```
